feed.title: Paralel Bitcoin only for conscious living individuals

entry.title: Paralel Bitcoin only for conscious living individuals
entry.summary: The forum's primary focus is on discussions related to Bitcoin. The subject matter brought up is identified as not only divergent from but also philosophically conflicting with the core principles of Bitcoin. As a result, the expectation for support or endorsement from this community on the topic is deemed unrealistic. This delineation underscores the forum's commitment to maintaining a focused discourse surrounding Bitcoin and its associated philosophies, suggesting that topics outside this realm may not be well-received or engaged with by its members.
